sentences.english: The Vmax and RI of HCC were higher than that in control group.
sentences.chinese: 原发性肝癌的血流呈高速高阻型。

sentences.english: These observations suggest that bleomycin A_6 may be useful in human liver cancer chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果提示博来霉素A_6有可能用于肝癌化疗。

sentences.english: To study the occurrence of primary liver cancer (PLC) among benignant hepatism patients with AFP rise.
sentences.chinese: 探讨AFP升高的良性肝病患者原发性肝癌发生率。

sentences.english: Cantharidin can lighten symptom of hepatic carcinoma and debase the content of AFP.
sentences.chinese: 斑蝥素治疗肝癌可减轻症状，降低甲胎蛋白含量。

sentences.english: Dendritic cells induce efficient and specific immune response against liver cancer in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 肝癌病人树突状细胞诱导高效而特异的抗肝癌免疫。

sentences.english: Dendritic cells induce efficient and specific immune response against liver cancer in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 肝癌病人树突状细胞诱导高效而特异的抗肝癌免疫。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of radiofrequency ablation(RFA)in treating unresectable liver cancer in laparotomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索开腹射频治疗在不可切除肝癌的治疗效果。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the usefulness of multiple RF needle electrodes in the treatment of hepatic cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价多弹头集束射频治疗肝癌的实用价值。

sentences.english: The mortality rates of UGI bleeding in patients with hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) associated with portal hypertension were 63%.
sentences.chinese: 合并肝癌患者上消化道出血之死亡率则为63%。

sentences.english: Yesterday, this well-known surgeon operated on a lung-cancer patient.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，这位著名的外科医生给一个肝癌患者做了手术。

sentences.english: Scorpion venom can meliorate symptom of hepatic carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 蝎毒介入治疗肝癌可改善症状。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the postoperative nursing after the operation of hepatoma intervention.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解肝癌介入术后的护理要点。

sentences.english: Therefore, the majority of liver cancer patients need non-surgical treatment.
sentences.chinese: 为此，绝大部分肝癌患者需非手术治疗。

sentences.english: Chinese Society of Liver Cancer, Chinese Anti-Cancer Association.
sentences.chinese: 中国抗癌协会肝癌专业委员会。

sentences.english: To investigate the outcome of radiofrequency ablation (RFA) in treatment for liver cancer located in the second hepatic portal.
sentences.chinese: 探讨第二肝门区肝癌射频消融的治疗结局。

sentences.english: China is a liver cancer-prone country.

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
